SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwDAMehrunesDagonStatueScript

short speech
float timer
short button
short messageOn

begin onactivate
	if GetStage fbmwDAMehrunes == 20 && player.GetItemCount 0rustyudaggeruunique > 0
		SetStage fbmwDAMehrunes 30
		set speech to 9
	elseif GetStage fbmwDAMehrunes < 10
		set speech to 1
	endif
end

begin gamemode

	if GetStage fbmwDAMehrunes == 40 || GetStage fbmwDAMehrunes == 25
		return
	endif

	if messageOn == 1

		set button to GetButtonPressed

		if ( button >= 0 ) 
			set messageOn to 0
		endif

		if button == 0
			set speech to 4	;agree
		elseif button == 1
			set speech to 6	;refuse
		endif
	endif

	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )

	if timer <= 0
		if GetStage fbmwDAMehrunes < 10
			if speech == 1
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAMehrunesDagonStatueREF.Say mwDAMehrunesDagonSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 2
			elseif speech == 2
				SetStage fbmwDAMehrunes 10
			endif
		elseif GetStage fbmwDAMehrunes == 10
			if speech == 2
				set speech to 3
				set messageon to 1
				MessageBox "Would you like a chance to prove your worth to me?" "I wish to prove my worth." "I have no desire to deal with you, Daedra Prince."
			elseif speech == 4
				set timer to mwDAMehrunesDagonStatueREF.Say mwDAMehrunesDagonSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1	;agree
				set speech to 5
			elseif speech == 5
				set timer to mwDAMehrunesDagonStatueREF.Say mwDAMehrunesDagonSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 7
			elseif speech == 6
				set timer to mwDAMehrunesDagonStatueREF.Say mwDAMehrunesDagonSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1	;refuse
				set speech to 8
			elseif speech == 7
				EnablePlayerControls
				SetStage fbmwdamehrunes 20	;agree
			elseif speech == 8
				EnablePlayerControls
				SetStage fbmwdamehrunes 25	;refuse
			endif
		elseif GetStage fbmwDAMehrunes == 30
			if speech == 9
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAMehrunesDagonStatueREF.Say mwDAMehrunesDagonSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 10
			elseif speech == 10
				EnablePlayerControls
				player.AddItem 0mehrunesaurazoruunique 1
				player.RemoveItem 0rustyudaggeruunique 1
				SetStage fbmwDAMehrunes 40
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 242 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
